forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10am and 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 93. Heat index values as high as 100. South southwest wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
